definitions.text: a short prayer generally preceding the lesson in the Church of Rome or the Church of England

examples: I am accumulating evidence for the man's unfaithfulness to his wife
She is amassing a lot of data for her thesis
She rolled up a small fortune

definitions.text: call for and obtain payment of
examples: we collected over a million dollars in outstanding debts
You can get the results on Monday
She picked up the children at the day care center
They pick up our trash twice a week

definitions.text: payable by the recipient on delivery
make a telephone call or mail a package so that the recipient pays
